#summary Release notes
#labels Featured,Phase-Design

==1.0.234==
 * Allow decoding any video size
 * Add support for high (CIF) and low (SQCIF) video encoding. QCIF was already supported in previous versions.
 * Resolve issue 12, 17 

==1.0.214==
 

- Begin Adding support for GSMA RCS Content Sharing (MSRP)
- Add support for arbitrary Video Size decoding
- Add support for CIF and SQCIF video encoding (Depends on the bandwidth config)
- Resolve Issues: 12, 17, 18, 19, 26 and 27.
